name: Rusty Sword
original_description: A rusty, dull old sword.

name: Silver Saber
original_description: Plated with silver to deter rust.

name: Dark Sword
original_description: It's glowing with vampire energy.

name: Holy Blade
original_description: It feels hopeful to wield.

name: Galaxy Sword
original_description: It's unlike anything you've ever seen.

name: Bone Sword
original_description: A very light piece of sharpened bone.

name: Iron Edge
original_description: A heavy broadsword.

name: Templar's Blade
original_description: It once belonged to an honorable knight.

name: Obsidian Edge
original_description: It's incredibly sharp.

name: Lava Katana
original_description: A powerful blade forged in a pool of churning lava.

name: Claymore
original_description: It's really heavy.

name: Steel Smallsword
original_description: A standard metal blade.

name: Wooden Blade
original_description: Not bad for a piece of carved wood.

name: Insect Head
original_description: Not very pleasant to wield.

name: Neptune's Glaive
original_description: An heirloom from beyond the Gem Sea.

name: Forest Sword
original_description: Made powerful by forest magic.

name: Carving Knife
original_description: A small, light blade.

name: Iron Dirk
original_description: A common dagger.

name: Burglar's Shank
original_description: A weapon of choice for the swift and silent.

name: Shadow Dagger
original_description: When you hold the blade to your ear you can hear 1,000 souls shrieking.

name: Elf Blade
original_description: Only the nimble hands of an elf could craft this.

name: Crystal Dagger
original_description: The blade is made of purified quartz.

name: Wind Spire
original_description: A swift little blade.

name: Galaxy Dagger
original_description: It's unlike anything you've seen.

name: Wood Club
original_description: A solid piece of wood, crudely chiseled into a club shape.

name: Alex's Bat
original_description: The sweet spot is dented from Alex's famous Grand Slam.

name: Lead Rod
original_description: It's incredibly heavy.

name: Wood Mallet
original_description: The solid head packs a punch. Relatively light for a club.

name: The Slammer
original_description: An extremely heavy gavel that'll send foes flying.

name: Galaxy Hammer
original_description: It's made from an ultra-light material you've never seen before.

name: Sam's Old Guitar
original_description: It's seen better days.

name: Femur
original_description: An old, heavy bone caked in centuries of grime.

name: Slingshot
original_description: Requires stones for ammo.

name: Master Slingshot
original_description: Requires stones for ammo.

name: Galaxy Slingshot
original_description: It looks really powerful.

name: Elliott's Pencil
original_description: Elliott used this to write his book. It's sharp!

name: Maru's Wrench
original_description: A big, metal wrench. It smells like Maru.

name: Harvey's Mallet
original_description: It brings back memories of Harvey's clinic.

name: Penny's Fryer
original_description: Penny's favorite frying pan. There's some rubbery gunk stuck to the inside.

name: Leah's Whittler
original_description: Leah's favorite tool for shaping driftwood.

name: Abby's Planchette
original_description: It's made from fine marblewood.

name: Seb's Lost Mace
original_description: One of Sebastian's medieval replicas.

name: Haley's Iron
original_description: It's searing hot and smells like Haley's hair.

name: Pirate's Sword
original_description: It looks like a pirate owned this once.

name: Cutlass
original_description: A finely crafted blade.

name: Wicked Kris
original_description: The blade is made of an iridium alloy.

name: Kudgel
original_description: A brute's companion.

name: Scythe
original_description: It can cut grass into hay, if you've built a silo.

name: Yeti Tooth
original_description: It's icy cold to the touch.

name: Rapier
original_description: An elegant blade.

name: Steel Falchion
original_description: Light and powerful.

name: Broken Trident
original_description: It came from the sea, but it's still sharp.

name: Tempered Broadsword
original_description: It looks like it could withstand anything.

name: Golden Scythe
original_description: It's more powerful than a normal scythe.
